# Bibliography

Associate professor (*Maître de conférences*) at [INSA Lyon, France](https://www.insa-lyon.fr/), since September 2023, and a member of the [PSPM](https://math.univ-lyon1.fr/icj/probabilites-statistique-physique-mathematique/) team at [Institut Camille Jordan (ICJ)](https://math.univ-lyon1.fr/icj/). I defended my Ph.D under the supervision of [Ali Gannoun](https://imag.umontpellier.fr/~gannoun/index.html) and [Lionel Cucala](https://imag.umontpellier.fr/~cucala/) at [University of Montpellier](https://www.umontpellier.fr/) in November 2021.

## Interests

-   Functional Data Analysis

-   Scan Statistics (Cluster Detection)

-   Statistical Testing

-   Spatial Statistics

-   Asymptotic Theory
